title: The Enlightening Adventures of Yousef Price
summary: This story follows Yousef Price, a 56-year-old teacher whose supernatural teaching abilities become crucial in solving mysterious events in his town over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Diese Geschichte folgt Yousef Price, einem 56-jährigen Lehrer, dessen übernatürliche Lehrfähigkeiten entscheidend werden, um über die Dauer einer Woche mysteriöse Ereignisse in seiner Stadt zu lösen.
summaryDutch: Dit verhaal volgt Yousef Price, een 56-jarige leraar wiens bovennatuurlijke onderwijsvaardigheden cruciaal worden bij het oplossen van mysterieuze gebeurtenissen in zijn stad gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Cette histoire suit Yousef Price, un enseignant de 56 ans dont les capacités d'enseignement surnaturelles deviennent cruciales pour résoudre des événements mystérieux dans sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Yousef discovers hidden ancient texts in the school’s library that grant him the ability to impart knowledge telepathically.
Using his newfound powers, Yousef helps a struggling student excel overnight. News of this miraculous turnaround spreads like wildfire.
The local news approaches Yousef, wanting to feature his story. He shyly agrees, hoping to inspire others.
Yousef’s powers attract the attention of envious scholars who question his methods and ethics.
Confronting the criticism, Yousef demonstrates his teaching abilities at a public seminar, winning over many skeptics.
His reputation restored, Yousef spends a peaceful day tutoring volunteer students, spreading joy and knowledge.
Reflecting on the week, Yousef realizes the true value of his gift isn't just in teaching but in empowering others to learn and grow.

ending: Thus, Yousef Price continued to enlighten minds, proving that true heroes empower others.
moral: Empowerment of others is the true hallmark of heroism.
